solution_line_template: For the first week, they bought {initial_oranges} + {added_oranges} = <<{initial_oranges}+{added_oranges}={first_week_total}>>{first_week_total}kgs.
For the next week, they bought twice the quantity of oranges which is {multiplier_twice}*{first_week_total} = <<{multiplier_twice}*{first_week_total}={next_week_quantity}>>{next_week_quantity}kgs.

For the next two weeks, the total quantity of oranges bought is {next_week_quantity}*{num_weeks_for_total} = <<{next_week_quantity}*{num_weeks_for_total}={total_next_two_weeks}>>{total_next_two_weeks} kgs.
The total quantity for the three weeks is {total_next_two_weeks}+{first_week_total}=<<{total_next_two_weeks}+{first_week_total}={total_three_weeks}>>{total_three_weeks} kgs
